name: Stock Entry Label
raw_commands:
{% for serial in frappe.get_list('Serial No', filters = {'status': 'Active', 'purchase_document_no': doc.name}, fields = ['print_code', 'item_name', 'batch_no', 'name', 'item_code', 'purchase_date']) %}

{% set item_price = frappe.db.get_value('Item Price', {'item_code': serial.item_code, 'price_list': 'Store Sales Rate Standard Selling'}, 'price_list_rate') %}

^XA
^FO010,100^A0N,35,35^FB500,4,0,C,0^FDSenbagam Paints^FS
^FO020,140^A0N,35,35^FB500,4,0,C,0^FD{{serial.item_code}}^FS
^FO020,170^A0N,35,35^FB500,4,0,C,0^FD{{serial.print_code}}^FS
^FO070,240^BY2,2^BCN,60,Y,N,N^ADB^FD{{ serial.name }}^FS



^FO400,60^A0N,35,35^FB500,4,0,C,0^FD{{serial.item_code }}^FS
^FO400,110^A0N,30,30^FB500,4,0,C,0^FD{{serial.batch_no}}^FS
^FO400,140^A0N,30,30^FB500,4,0,C,0^FD{{serial.print_code}}^FS
^FO555,180^BY1,2^BCN,40,Y,N,N^ADB^FD{{ serial.print_code }}^FS

^FO410,280^A0N,30,30^FB500,4,0,C,0^FDM.R.P: {{item_price }}0^FS

^FO400,310^A0N,29,29^FB500,4,0,C,0^FD(Inclusive of all taxes)^FS
^FO400,340^A0N,29,29^FB500,4,0,C,0^FDColor Cost Extra^FS
^FO400,370^A0N,29,29^FB500,4,0,C,0^FDPkd {{ serial.purchase_date}} ^FS


^FS
^XZ
